history.content:
You can add as many units on Telebears as you want during the Adjustment Period. Just request approval later. I believe the deadline to request approval is before the 5th week of classes. For CS, the major advisers are Lily Zhang, Christopher Hunn, and Charlene Hughes. You can schedule an appointment here.

Commenting on the above answer, the unit cap is a soft cap, so you can go a bit above it, but you can't add another class if you've already reached it.

You can add as many units on Telebears as you want during the Adjustment Period. Just request approval later. I believe the deadline to request approval is before the 5th week of classes. For CS, the major advisers are Lily Zhang, Christopher Hunn, and Charlene Hughes. You can schedule an appointment here.
How do we find our major advisor so that we can add more than 20.5 units during adjustment period?
history.subject: Finding Major Advisor
